website_summaries.verdict: A safe homeopathic remedy that works best when given to dogs over time.
pros: Helps keep dogs calmer on a day-to-day basis
Drops are easy to mix with food or water
cons: Some pets don’t respond at all to the drops
Not as effective for short-term anxiety crises like thunderstorms

website_summaries.verdict: This natural anxiety relief calms any hyper cat.
pros: A simple way to calm stressed-out or hyperactive cats
This alcohol-free solution can be put in wet food
Customers love using this before vet visits or before bedtime to calm rambunctious kitties
cons: These drops won't work for all cats

customer_reviews.title: I have a 70 pound female pit bull with terrible anxiety and fear aggression
customer_reviews.text: I have a 70 pound female pit bull with terrible anxiety and fear aggression. We do behavioral training with other dogs and people which puts her anxiety into overdrive! Well rescue remedy is a life saver!! She gets half dropper full 10 minutes before class and no issues. She gets full dropper before we leave and she is calm and sleeping in her crate before we are even out the door. We also have a chihuahua with separation anxiety and they work like a charm on her as well. We were about to put them both on medication and didn’t want to do that. My trainer recommended rescue remedy and we are so glad he did. Amazing product highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TinaMarie

customer_reviews.title: Chill Factor for Cats - Nirvana in a Bottle
customer_reviews.text: Kitties chill with this five flower remedy acting on the emotional body. Makes vet appointments and travel a piece of cake. A must for any pet. Conflicts melt away with this product - Ecstacy with a few drops. Great for sick kitties or out rescuing them.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderfully to calm my easily freaked out kitty. My older girl can get very anxious at times and 2-3 drops in her wet cat food and she calms down quickly.
customer_reviews.author: A. Schafrath

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This has been a life saver. My dog no longer cries for twenty minutes when I leave her alone. Much to the delight of the other tenants in my condo complex. I also used it to help my dog remain calm while recovering from heartworm disease. Keeping her calm was key to prevent complications. I put it on a square inch of bread and she loves it. I gave her an inch of bread one day without it on it and she spit it out. So the taste must be good. Love that it's a natural product that contains no additives.
customer_reviews.author: Larisa Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product So Far
customer_reviews.text: Our little rescue pup has been with us now for 5 months. It seems he simply cannot be left alone without biting the blinds and barking so much he soaks the front of his coat in saliva. 4 or 5 drops of Rescue Med on a dog treat now keeps him mellow for several hours. It calms him without seeming to totally smother his personality, that makes us happy! Great product so far.
customer_reviews.author: DxBaxelg

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyone/pet - Adverse reactions
customer_reviews.text: Gave recommended dose to 2 of my 4 dogs to help with their anxiety. Dogs went from just a mild anxiety to pacing and cowering. They've never done that and it was both dogs reacting that way. I noticed the ingredients are the same as in the child's version so i tried it myself. It gave me the most disturbing, vivid nightmares. I wont use this again for my pets or myself. And of course there is no return because the seller doesn't even have faith in their product.
customer_reviews.author: D. Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: This stuff really works. We adopted a pit bull ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really works. We adopted a pit bull mix a week ago. She had significant trauma history. She has been very nervous/needy this whole week. We got this stuff in the mail today. We are having severe thunderstorms all day. We had a lightning strike on a tree in our front yard. Our dog sort of freaked out. I put a couple of drops directly into her mouth and she was calm within about 10 minutes and has remained calm for the last 2 hours. I am impressed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vickie T.

customer_reviews.title: The product itself if good if it does not come broken
customer_reviews.text: The product itself if good if it does not come broken. Unfortunately mine came with an intact box but the product inside had been opened and the bottle and dropper both broken and contents gone. Not only was the internal packaging defective but it looked like the product had been opened and broken before leaving storage.
customer_reviews.author: Janine C Hagan

customer_reviews.title: From psychotic to puuurrrrfect!
customer_reviews.text: I was ecstatic when I saw they made this for pets! I've been using the people version for 20 years when needed and for 15 of those years I had though to myself what a much more relaxed life my cat would have if they made kitty xanax. Well, this is the perfect solution and I'm not drugging her! It's natural! I put a few drops on a treat when I'm about to do something that I know is going to stress her out (moving and unpacking boxes). She also licks the remnants of it off my fingers, so she must like the taste.
customer_reviews.author: Messica

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: This is a wondeful product if you have animals with anxiety, this New Years was the true test for a couple of my dogs.. Usually a couple of my dogs are beyond scared of the fireworks, I have tried just about everything in the past.. A friend told me about this product, I simply put 4 drops on a treat and feed it to my dogs and they could careless about the noise. They woke up a couple times to some very loud booms and looked at me and went back to enjoying their sleep.
customer_reviews.author: J. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Game changer for my dog’s seizures!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old pup has started to have seizures randomly at night. Our vet didn’t know the cause but wanted to put him on seizure medication. However, being holistic, I wanted to try and treat it naturally before resorting to any prescription. And I am so happy to report that Bach’s Pet Remedy has helped my dog so much! We have been using it every day, and no seizures have occurred in a whole month so far! So happy! Thank you Bach’s!
customer_reviews.author: Chas G.

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this product with great hope that it would help my dog who has ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product with great hope that it would help my dog who has severe separation anxiety but after several weeks of consistently using it in her water and also placing a small drop on her daily I have seen no improvement. It may be a helpful product for some but perhaps isn't as helpful for those with a more severe issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this to any cat or dog owner
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this to any cat or dog owner. I have a rescue cat with anxieties because of past abuse. She was “marking all over the house and I was frantic. I started putting 2-3 drops in her water bowl in August, it takes a month before the calming kicks in because it’s a natural remedy but since September, nothing. Good for dogs near 4th of July.
customer_reviews.author: Angela A. Sabatino

customer_reviews.title: Bach Resue is an amazing product. Our Umbrella Cockatoo has stress issues
customer_reviews.text: Bach Resue is an amazing product. Our Umbrella Cockatoo has stress issues. This product has helped Amy to stop picking her feathers!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Truly works, give it up to 20 to 30mins ...
customer_reviews.text: Truly works, give it up to 20 to 30mins depending on the weight of your dog. It really does calm them down. My dog HATES the car, I gave her this and in 30 mins she finally calmed down, stopped shaking and whimping, she finally laid down in her cage in the car so I could get her to the beach after 2 hours in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Made TWO cats have bad reactions
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to help transition two cats into the same house. One week before we moved the cats to the same house, my boyfriend and I used this product with our cats in separate homes. My cat had poop squirts around the home after using this the first day, and a few days after stopping. He also paced back and forth. My boyfriends cat literally spazzed out after first (and only use) running through the home, panting etc. Do NOT recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ashattack365

customer_reviews.title: I gave this to my very energetic cat to see if I could calm him down so I could more easily trim his claws
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this to work but it just didn't. I gave this to my very energetic cat to see if I could calm him down so I could more easily trim his claws. Yeah, it didn't do a thing. On to the next idea.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Not for Us
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this product does not work for my Shih Tzu. After 20 drops, she still had erratic behavior. I did discuss this item with my Veterinarian. I've tried many of these organic, holistic, etc items and they just do not work for her. I purchased it specifically based on the "riding in cars" or "visiting the vet".
customer_reviews.author: AmaShop1

customer_reviews.title: It's either hit or miss
customer_reviews.text: It's either hit or miss, so take your chances. Introducing a newly adopted kitten to an existing cat can be stressful for both cats and humans. We did a lot of research and took small steps to introduce each other. Both cats eventually got used to each other after a week or so. I was hoping this could calm down my older cat during the process since she is already extremely skittish, but I didn't see any difference during the process. Since there is a no return policy, I might give it to other pet owner friends who might need it. I hope my review was helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Mew

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful relaxing drops for kitty issues
customer_reviews.text: I have a kitten who has upset my older female cat immensely. They got into fights all the time initially. The Rescue drops have definitely helped. Now they just seem to fight once a day. I give them to the kitten every time she eats, and to the older one in the morning when she seems the most stressed by the kitten. They don't knock anyone out, just make kitties more relaxed. I don't think we will be able to live without these drops from now on! They are also good for things like: giving to the cats before a trip to the vet, and relaxing cats when contractors or strangers are in the house making a lot of noise.
customer_reviews.author: Lily Jones

customer_reviews.title: Vet recommended prozac at one time for Brutus (lab mix) but ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second or third time I've ordered this product and I can honestly say it works very well for my dogs. My son's dog is a neurotic mess when it comes to loud noises whether it be weather related or target practice/fireworks. Vet recommended prozac at one time for Brutus (lab mix) but if we catch it in time we can use this and it really helps to calm him down and it's all natural. He does require more than one dose usually 6-8 drops as opposed to the standard listed of 4 drops. This also works on my dog who is a shih-poo too and just at the standard dose for him.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Bates

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful for my dog's self-destrictive anxiety.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for our pet who flips out over fire works. This was the first year he didn't tear some thing to shreds. The poor fella would just panic in the past to the point I was afraid he would injure himself very badly. This year I dosed him 4 hours before and right at the time and he remained calm the entire time. He relaxed quite a bit. I'm sold and have recommended this several times for folks.
customer_reviews.author: PSBoyte

customer_reviews.title: Didn't do anything
customer_reviews.text: This didn't do anything for my dog who is essentially a walking bundle of anxiety. I've tried many things with him - prescription anxiety meds, adaptil diffusers, thundershirt, CBD, doggie massage, he sees a behaviorist, etc. So figured it couldn't hurt to try this. I tried using on a daily basis and in specific situations and saw no discernible effect, positive or negative. It certainly seems to help some animals, so if you've got a pet with issues, it's inexpensive, so worth trying.
customer_reviews.author: 🌟 Emma Elizabeth 🌟

customer_reviews.title: Useless, Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Tried this on a Persian Himalayan cat. Totally worthless. Tried 2 drops, tried 4 drops, tried 2ml, no effect at all. She didn't get sleepy, didn't get tame, nothing. Don't think the positive reviews are legit. Maybe they were paid off, or given free samples for a review, that happens on Amazon. As far as this product, it had no effect on my cat. Skip it.
customer_reviews.author: Jake is Cool

customer_reviews.title: Dog feels better so it's worth it!
customer_reviews.text: High value for money as it seems to do an OK job of fixing our small dog's anxiety (which feels nearly impossible during storms/fireworks) and is a fair price. It's no dog equivalent of Xanax but I have to imagine you need a dog prescription for that. Still I will continue buying and using as it does work pretty well on the pup to shift from major freakout mode to ok dad... this storm is a little scary and let's cuddle.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie S.

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work for my dog
customer_reviews.text: Makes my dog pretty zen without completely knocking her out. She can still be alert and aware of the scary noises, but doesn't seem to have enough physical or mental energy to really care about it. ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Amy E.

customer_reviews.title: Help for Psycho Kitty!
customer_reviews.text: One of my rescue grandcats had a traumatic background. To say she does not play well with others is an understatement. She is terrified of other cats, even if they are friendly and loveable. We have used one bottle of Rescue Remedy as directed and are optimistic about the results. Her freak-out episodes aree happening less often, are less dramatic and are of shorter duration. We ordered another bottle
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Wow -- it works, and fast
customer_reviews.text: I recently adopted a great senior dog. He is scared of thunderstorms and construction sounds, both of which are in season here, to the point of shivering debilitation, just super stressed. As we get to know each other, the storms and noise weren't helping with establishing our routines and transition from shelter to home. I put RR in his water bowl daily, and rub RR on his paw pads and inner ear skin. At the firat sign of disruption. Combined with consistency, love, and routine, I was amazed to see him calm down instantly, almost every time. I'm sold.
customer_reviews.author: PoetPirate

customer_reviews.title: My bird plucked MORE on these drops!
customer_reviews.text: I adopted an eclectus parrot in September 2019 that had a slight plucking problem. I wanted to try and calm his over preening behavior. After using these drops for almost 3 weeks he has completely pulled out almost all his feathers! His plucking actually worse after giving him these drops! And he hates the taste of it sho i have to add to his water. Not happy at all. All the hard work I put into regrowing his feathers; the aloe, bathing, fish oil pills, doubling his chop and veggies getting him all the nutrients to regrow them and he's now yanked almost everything out since starting these drops!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works works works!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old bishon has THE WORST separation anxiety! Before we got him he was locked in a kennel every day for atleast 12 hours a day because the owners were never home. I have had him for 5 years now, he is never put in a kennel and never left alone, yet when anyone leaves the house, especially my daughter he freaks! These drops are our saving grace after years of trying other methods to calm him.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe this works very well for our cat name buddy. Buddy let's my hubby and I sleep in until 9 am daily. Buddy is a middle age cat. I put 4 drops in his wet food bout 3 times a day. Since putting this in his wet food. Buddy plays a lot more each day. Buddy is more calm and more relax. Buddy relaxes a lot each day. Buddy enjoys playing off and on during each day. Buddy still meows bout 15 minutes. Buddy meows for bout 5 to 10 minutes. This stuff is amazing. This stuff works very well. I will order more of this soon. I am so very happy with this product.!!!
customer_reviews.author: beauty queen

customer_reviews.title: I hoped it would work, but it made no noticeable change in my dog’s anxiety.
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t seem to have any effect on my dog. We tried it before we had company over and he was just as ramped up as he was without it. We also tried it numerous times when we left him at home alone and again, we could see no positive effect in his behavior. We have security cameras in the home and when we check on him he is pacing and barking and howling just as much as he did with out it. Really had hoped it would relieve some of his stress.
customer_reviews.author: DoveSoup

customer_reviews.title: Did the job
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when I adopted my rescue cat. She was frightened of thunderstorms. I would give her some as soon as the first thunder was heard. Ironically, I also fall asleep to a thunderstorm CD. At first my cat didn't sleep in my bedroom, but now she does as she has become desensitized to the thunder. I no longer have to give her this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: L. Wolff

customer_reviews.title: I feel awful that I put my poor cat through that
customer_reviews.text: I have this product one star because I had to give it something. I have a 5 year old cat and when I travel with her she gets very car sick. I used 3 drops as suggested on the label and it didn’t calm her down and made me extremely ill. I have never seen her so sick and I believe it had something to do with these drop. Do yourself a favor and don’t purchase, I feel awful that I put my poor cat through that.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Navas

customer_reviews.title: Miraculous Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff ABSOLUTLEY works! You will have to experiment with the dosage for your pet. We started out with the 4 drops and didn't see much improvement with our hyperactive, fearful rescue dog. We tried 6 drops the next day and that was the correct dosage. It calmed him down and the difference in behavior was nothing short of miraculous. He is relaxed enough that we can begin to socialize him. He did great in the car, and we were able to go on a walk without him being so fearful. Would absolutely recommend this product. It is a God send.
customer_reviews.author: Rabbithash

customer_reviews.title: Makes trips to the vet less stressful
customer_reviews.text: Helps my dog relax for a vet visit. I give it to him shortly before we leave the house. Also seems to help him relax when he’s itchy. I use 4-5 drops mixed in a little peanut butter for my 75 pound dog. I use to give him the Rescue Remedy spray for people, but i was told it has alcohol in it which isn’t good for dogs so I switched to the one designed for dogs.
customer_reviews.author: StackJumper

customer_reviews.title: sort of helped my African grey
customer_reviews.text: I have a 26 year old African Grey who was rescued with a lot of anxiety problems and specifically in spring gets hormonal and that mixed with the anxiety causes a lot of issues so I was trying this out and I have to say it kind of helped but not enough. However just because it did help I would say if you have a bird that is being hormonal or has anxiety maybe try it out. I don't think it's a fix but it could help them a little bit and make their life a little easier, I have no experience using this with any animals other than parrots.
customer_reviews.author: Connerj

customer_reviews.title: This is Rescue Remedy For Pets
customer_reviews.text: Giving this four-stars is simply because I was trying to buy rescue remedy for myself and this is rescue remedy for pets. I’ve always purchased the regular rescue remedy and used it for me and my cat. I bought this because everything else said that it was for pets, but it turned out this was too and I had to buy it elsewhere online
customer_reviews.author: C.M.

customer_reviews.title: I Have My Friend Back
customer_reviews.text: My 3 yr. Old Maine Coon was and still is a biter. Last month, he bit me on my leg, it got infected. I was sadly contemplating giving him back to the shelter, because putting him on kitty Prozac was def not an option i was willing to do. The vet suggested Rescue Remedy, saying its not effective for every cat, but I was desperate. I gave Minky 4 drops, as the directions state and within minutes, he was mellowed out....WOW!! I recommend this to anyone who, like me, refuses ro put his/her furry companion on DRUGS! Thank you, BACH, for this wonderful product. Blessings, Minky's mom🐾😻❤
customer_reviews.author: zengirl

customer_reviews.title: Don't think it worked for my dog
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my dog after seeing a recommendation on a facebook group. She has extreme separation anxiety when we leave her in our camper and go exploring. My other 2 dogs are in there with her, but she just doesn't do well with us leaving. She wants to be near us at all times. I thought maybe it would help her even a tad, but it didn't. Though Xanax doesn't work for her either. I'd rather have a more natural solution. Guess I'll try CBD next since this was a no go.
customer_reviews.author: karapg

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!!
customer_reviews.text: This didn’t do anything for either of my dogs! One of our dogs went crazy after I️ recently found out I️ was pregnant and decided to tear through the wall while left at home alone like he was trying to get out. Got this stuff to try to calm his anxiousness or whatever it was and it didn’t do anything.
customer_reviews.author: sean s

customer_reviews.title: Got us thru a tornado that was close to us
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical but ordered anyway. I gave it to him once or twice when we would leave the house because he has separation anxiety. Anyway, about a week or so after we got this, we were having some rough weather and I gave it to him and I even took it. Ended up we had a tornado about 3 miles away that night and he and I were calm as could be thru all the rocking and rolling, wind, rain and thunder. So, I guess it works and I'll be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Wants quality for cheap

customer_reviews.title: W/I 1 WEEK MY CAT'S FUR LOSS HAS STOPPED AND SHE'S STOPPED ISOLATING!
customer_reviews.text: She was diagnosed with anxiety as a young cat and we've given her amitriptyline for years. While it helped her shedding issue, she continued to isolate herself from the other cats and hiss whenever they come near. We tried hemp oil for a while, but after a couple of months it stopped working for her. I selected this product because someone posted a review and mentioned that their cat stopped losing hair. 1/2 dropper daily seems to be reversing the hair loss for our cat and she stopped hiding and hissing within 4 days of using this. We are guardedly excited!
customer_reviews.author: IMAGE J.

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work great
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I have a cat who constantly licks spots on her body to the point of chewing on her skin. I have talked to several people about this and have been told that some animals do this, and it gets to be habit. I put four drops in her food morning and evening feedings (wet food) I have noticed it has calmed her down and she does not seem to be biting herself. She is an indoor kitty, so no fleas. I have tried to buy her "clean" food and she does not eat it. Wants her Fancy Feast Seafood and won't touch anything else. I have noticed a pretty big change in her and very happy about it.
customer_reviews.author: Rhea Meadow

customer_reviews.title: Proven Effective "Chill-out"
customer_reviews.text: This is an established proven effective product that is calming for my dog and senior feisty cat. It's "chill-out" use is good for nail trims on both, travelling in the car and during storms. * I would advise to not purchase online during summer months if your mail box is on the street like my black one - the temperature is extremely hot & my package sat our there for 8 hours
customer_reviews.author: PennyD

customer_reviews.title: It helped my
customer_reviews.text: These have been a godsend to my little Granny kitty. She has the worst anxiety and stress around any other cat and we have 4 others. I started with 8 drops in her water bowl and replace the water daily. This has led her to feeling an all-day calm and she is even putting on happy weight. Thank goodness for this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Silvio The Wolf

customer_reviews.title: not sure if they were just better travelers then expected or it helped
customer_reviews.text: Came as expected though I am not sure what I was expecting it to do. I recently moved 3 cat halfway across the country. They seemed relatively calm for the majority of the ride though with nothing to compare it to, not sure if they were just better travelers then expected or it helped. I mixed some drops each morning of the trip with those meat tube cat treats (look like gogurt for cats). They ate it with no issue.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Relaxed cat!!
customer_reviews.text: All my cats are rescues and some are more sensitive than others. My poor 2 year old boy licks his shoulder so much he has sores and the next step was prozac. I couldnt keep him in a thundershirt 24/7. Today I rubbed some of this on his ear and after a little while he curled up on the couch with me and fell asleep. I was able to stroke him and not have him get upset and leave. He laid there and relaxed! I'm keeping this stuff around from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: HUGE difference in my over anxious husky. I use it every day for her before I leave in the morning, and she even managed to sleep during the 4th of July, which is usually a week long anti-sleep event. I'm even trying the one for people!
customer_reviews.author: Delaney

customer_reviews.title: My rabbit adores this, and I think it's helping her.
customer_reviews.text: When I looked into treatments for rabbit-anxiety, I got a lot of "rabbits are just anxious. Get used to it." But I don't think they meant like this. My rabbit was pulled off the street, and she will nip, kick, bite, snort, and run and hide if anything even remotely scary happens. If she's picked up, she's in high-alert for weeks. So I got this. I gave her a few drops and she ripped the syringe out of my hands, she loved the taste so much! She also seems to be feeling better, literally leaping onto my computer without any warning.
customer_reviews.author: Cooper

customer_reviews.title: did the trick with fireworks
customer_reviews.text: My dogs goes nuts with gunshots/fireworks and bark and shake and just are anxious as could be. We started this two days before 4th of July and the day of gave them it twice and they barely acknowledged the fireworks (and they are shot off behind our house by the town). So Super loud as they were, the dogs didn't mind. Definitely works. IT didn't seem to make them drowsy, just laid back. I definitely recommend this for anxious dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Working for thunder & fireworks
customer_reviews.text: I have a 70 lb large dog that is terrified of loud noises (thunder & fireworks). She take the drops on any treat so they must not have a bad taste, because she is picky! The only problem I have is if I don’t get it in her before she gets terrified , then it’s too late and she won’t take anything (even peanut butter) if she’s already panicking. But when given just before the panic sets in these drops really do help calm her down during storms , etc. have been very helpful
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: OMG this product is amazing. I am so glad I gave it try. I tried a few different product before finding this but none worked for cat. She gets very nervous in car and panics every time. She pukes, pee, poop and every possible thing in car. I really needed to find some good product to calm her down because i needed to move to Amarica from overseas for military move and had to go through more than 24hrs of travel time (11hrs flight and looong drive) ... this was a life saver. She was relaxed in car and was doing really good in such a stressful situation. I couldn’t have traveled so many hours without this product. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Ari

customer_reviews.title: Great Homeopathic Remedy for Anxiety and Stress
customer_reviews.text: We use this product for many of our pets. We have a dog that is on fluoxetine, and use this to help her sleep at night. This is great to help with storm anxiety. It does not take away the fears, but we definitely notice that it helps them calm down. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Maybe water?
customer_reviews.text: I think we got water. It isn’t effecting my cats at all. With a whole dropper full. Nothing. Nada. Calls for 4 drops and a whole dropper fazes none of the 3.
customer_reviews.author: amanda smith

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me
customer_reviews.text: I have a show dog, so he is an intact male. I attended a 3-day dog show in January. The first day he was unmanageable, barking, screaming, pulling. Barked while we were in the ring! I believe it was because he could smell girls in heat and was just (naturally) out of control. So Day 2, I dosed him with Rescue Remedy. I ended up giving him 3 doses over about an hour and a half, one dropper full at a time (the first two didn’t calm him down enough). Worked like a charm. He was relaxed without being sleepy. I personally believe it made a difference.
customer_reviews.author: TerrierLover

customer_reviews.title: Did not help my rabbit
customer_reviews.text: I have a dwarf black otter rabbit and I tried these drops to help with his aggression and biting. It didn’t seem to help at all sadly. I tried it for a good week starting with about 5 drops and then doing the whole dropper. My rabbit licked it right up but towards the end of the week he didn’t seem to care anymore. I don’t think it works. I will save it and try it on my dog when we travel next year but she is a 70lb husky/shepherd so if it didn’t work on a 2lb rabbit then I doubt it will work on her sadly.
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully This Works - Will Continue Using
customer_reviews.text: This was suggested from the animal shelter I work for as I am bringing in 2 more kittens. . My cat has had the house to herself for 8 months. I was told this would help her be calm as she adjusts to the new kittens coming in. I was told by the experts at the shelter to put three drops in my cat's wet food. It must not change the taste because she still eats the food. Hopefully it works! We used it for 9 days. The kittens have been here for 6 days. I will continue using and pray that it helps my cat adjust. Will update
customer_reviews.author: Maria Gagliano

customer_reviews.title: Works~
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as we just got a new rescue, and he gets very nervous and sick when riding. It seems to help, I give him a few drops about 15 minutes before we leave. If it’s a longer ride, I give him a couple more drops. I used Rescue Remedy for years with our other dog, he hated gun shots & fireworks. It does help. Hard to explain, it does not make them drowsy or anything like that, just kind of takes the anxiety down a bit.
customer_reviews.author: smitty`s choice

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it works
customer_reviews.text: I'm not really sure if this product works for my dog's crate anxiety or not. She is definitely still anxious even after using it, but it may help slightly. Since it's relatively cheap and definitely doesn't make it worse I continue to use it. I think if you're on the fence about it it's definitely worth a try. I use it in conjunction with a stuffed kong toy, a bark collar (vibrating and beeping, but no shock)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product!! Separation Anxiety Under Control
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing!! My dog has been suffering from separation anxiety for the past year. It's been bad. He destroyed things and made a mess when left alone. His trainer recommended this and it's honestly a miracle worker. It has helped my dog with the anxiety and now we are able to leave him home alone without having to worry about him destroying anything. The seller was amazing as well. I had an issue (on my end not theirs) and they resolved it immediately without any problems. I will be repurchasing this once he finishes the bottle I got.
customer_reviews.author: Chiny

customer_reviews.title: Calmer cats
customer_reviews.text: I put two dropper-fulls into a water dish in attempt to calm down older cats upset by a recently adopted cat. It seems to work, after only about a week there is much less growling, posturing and chasing. New cat has been with us for almost 6 months, in last couple of weeks I have seen a noticeable change in behavior. the only factor that changed id this pet rescue remedy in their water dish. Delivery was surprisingly fast, in past Bach Rescue Remedy came from Germany, which took longer.
customer_reviews.author: Bunny's mom

customer_reviews.title: Completely wasted my money - don't waste yours!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on the other reviews that it worked for people's dogs - did not work for my dog's car anxiety at all. I even increased the dosage hoping it would work, but all it did was give my dog soft stools. I have to resort to prescription medication because homeopathic meds are definitely hit or miss. This one completely misses the mark.
customer_reviews.author: PositiveGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Not only did this assist our cats in moving - we had a friend whose birds were very anxious about their move (screeching and pulling feathers). They were considering re-homing the birds since they could not get any sleep with them around. We gave them the remainder of our bottle and they bought their own when it ran out. I did not use as much as the bottle directed (4 drops) - I used 2 drops in a 1/3 of a three oz canned food (for three cats) and all three cats were calm and even sleepy for several hours. The calmness stayed all day. Cats are two 8 lb 1 year olds and one 12 lb 5 year old.
customer_reviews.author: V Sansonetti

customer_reviews.title: Works fast!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work quickly. My cat is a semi-domestic farel cat. She was really settled in when we needed to take her to the vet twice in two weeks. She then was so afraid again she wouldn't even come inside to eat with anyone near the door. After 4 drops added to a small dish of food two days in a row, she is much calmer and will allow us to open the door for her again.
customer_reviews.author: E M Stoner

customer_reviews.title: Great Aid
customer_reviews.text: Had success w/ rescue remedy in our family and now have an option for my pets as well. Administered a dose to my farm collie before a long car ride. She was relaxed and content through a 4 hour car ride and day at a new barn with unfamiliar people and animals.
customer_reviews.author: bluebonnet

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t seem to do anything
customer_reviews.text: my one cat couldn’t stand it when i’d put it in her mouth, but there was no change in anything when i did it that way or put into canned food. i even tried it myself (since it’s supposed to be almost the same as the human one, minus the alcohol), since i had ok response to a bach flower remedy years & years ago.. but nope, felt absolutely nothing. oh well.
customer_reviews.author: whitebirch

customer_reviews.title: Best calming remedy by far
customer_reviews.text: Best calming remedy by far! It calms my dog but doesn't knock her out like other brands. The dropper is easy to use to add to her food or just squirt in her mouth. Though she has super picky taste, she loves this!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L Klisz

customer_reviews.title: Good 'til the last drop.
customer_reviews.text: Calms a partly feral cat down enough to stop him from pissing all over the apartment. I put more litter boxes around, and that helps, too. Now if I can only keep that outside cat from spraying my front door (he or she wants in really bad). That's part of the problem.
customer_reviews.author: KateQ

customer_reviews.title: Seemed to work at first
customer_reviews.text: This really seemed to work briefly for my senior beagle suffering from dementia. He needed double the 4 recommended drops from the start and after awhile it no longer seemed to help with his Sundowners anxiety. I am not sure if it was just the progression of his disease or if he built up a tolerance with the product with repeated use. I am going to test its effectiveness on one of my horses and myself during our next show, where we both get a bit anxious about competing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My kitty calms right down
customer_reviews.text: My cat is feral and was abandoned/separated from her mom at 4 weeks. She is very wary of everything and everybody except me. I give her these drops on her morning treats and she is calm and usually happy. When I ran out she gradually became more and more tense and skitterish. I got more drops and she went back to being herself, wary but content most days.
customer_reviews.author: ruthieo54

customer_reviews.title: Not really sure what to think yet.
customer_reviews.text: I dont think my dog minds the taste, but doesnt love it.. if that makes sense? I also dont notice much of a difference, but I am not sure if thats because it should be used daily or if it can be used intermittently?? I only used a few times, randomly so maybe thats the reason its not as noticable. Will keep on hand for those stressful moments!
customer_reviews.author: Cortney Michelle Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Slow down
customer_reviews.text: Our female cat has been suffering from separation anxiety since we had to leave her in our neighbors care for several days, she wouldn't come into the house for nearly two weeks upon our return and she finally started coming in for her food and then leaving immediately. We decided to try some of this product because of it's natural nature, WOW! It calmed her right down within several days with just two drops in her food morning and evening. Now we only have to give her a couple drops every other day and she is back to being herself. Five STARS
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Peters

customer_reviews.title: Works Like Magic!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing anti-stress remedy. I foster cats & some of them who are scared & hiding, come out, eat, & socialize an hour after they have some in their water. I've been using it for 5 years now & it works like a charm every time. While I expect each cat's reaction to be different, I have yet to see it fail in relieving the stress & calming down one.
customer_reviews.author: Hala S. Arafa

customer_reviews.title: give it a shot, it's worth trying to see if it will help your fur-baby!
customer_reviews.text: this is our 2nd bottle and it's helped our little chihuahua with anxiety and licking. it hasn't stopped him from howling when i leave the room/house but he's a spoiled cuddly chihuahua, what can i say?! he has improved on barking at our guests- SIGNIFICANTLY and this has been the only change we've made (in addition to adding a baby to the mix and them having less attention).... we saw an improvement in about 3-4 days.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Cakes

customer_reviews.title: so I'm satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I have two cats, one of whom gets so nervous during car rides that she poops in her carrier or on my lap. I bought this to calm both cats down during the hour-long car ride to my new apartment so that I wouldn't have to clean any poop up from inside my car. I didn't notice a huge difference in their behavior after giving it to them via treat, but both of them were relatively calm during the car ride. I wasn't pooped on, which is a step in the right direction. I'm not positive if it really worked, but I got through the move with little struggle, so I'm satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Really Work!
customer_reviews.text: We rescued a pit bull about a year ago and do not know his age, but our vet guesses him to be about 1.5 years. He gets anxious when we leave him and rheswbdeopa work wonders! We have also recently taken in another rescue, this one is about 6 weeks old. She seems to stress our Buddy out, but these drops are SO helpful! I am sure that with the help of the drops easing this transition, they will come to get along fine.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: This is good price and product
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. My cats are happy. It’s not something that will calm your cat down or anything It’s just to make them happier and cheerful. I met a naturopath who study about this product and she said its just as good for humans and I tried and it just put me into cheerful mood. But yeah I give to my cats maybe 3 times a week and they like it!
customer_reviews.author: Lulu K

customer_reviews.title: He eats well and has found a comfortable hiding place in the closet
customer_reviews.text: I have a rescue kitty who is extra shy and scared. I think this is helping a bit. He eats well and has found a comfortable hiding place in the closet. The rest is just a matter of waiting for him to adjust. I'll keep on using this in his food.
customer_reviews.author: ohwell1

customer_reviews.title: It does work.  Keep it up.
customer_reviews.text: Yes it works. BUT you must keep it up. We have 8 cats and at times they fight. NOT to much, but found they are better with this in the water than without.
customer_reviews.author: D. Kent

customer_reviews.title: Calms down a scared dog in minutes!
customer_reviews.text: In Florida during the summer, it storms almost daily. My MIL's chihuahua is terrified of storms and starts shaking uncontrollably at the first sound of distant thunder. With this product, he calms down within fice minutes. I've seen it myself. He doesn't appear drugged, just calm. It's amazing, and I'd recommend it to anyone who has easily frightened pets at home where the thundershirt and other similar products have failed.
customer_reviews.author: Severard

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS and it’s safe!!
customer_reviews.text: I gave my insane/aggressive/neurotic (but adorable) 6 month old kitten this and he was calm and sweet within 15 minutes. He went from attacking my older cat and destroying the furniture to lounging peacefully on the couch. This stuff is a LIFE SAVER I would buy it by the gallon.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Using it for my kittys
customer_reviews.text: Both my rescue kitties started having a lot of anxiety when they were about seven months old this does seem to help when I give them four drops in the morning and four drops in the evening sometimes I do have to give them a few extra in the afternoon if there’s stressful situations happening like a repair man or visitors or loud noises
customer_reviews.author: Iva

customer_reviews.title: Works well for our dog.
customer_reviews.text: We adopted a rescue dog and it appears his last owners were very neglectful. Our dog has a lot of anxiety and stress as a result. I don't know that he will ever get over it, seems to be part of his personality as well. We've been using these drops for a year now and it's been great. He is much calmer and easy going. He still has anxiety and stress but it's not at a point where we have to worry about him or what he will do.
customer_reviews.author: Migizi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my cat is a bit of a nervous traveler and i had a 16 hour move by car. I gave his the recommended dosage before i put him in his crate and besides about 30 minutes of nervous meowing he was pretty mellow. I also put a few drops and some treats and that definitely seemed to help. Now i use this about 30 minutes before i have to do something i know he’ll hate. Such as going to the vet, bath time, and clipping his nails. Love, love love these drops
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure of the correct dose for my Maltese, since he is only 8 lbs, so I just gave him 2 drops on a treat. Put him in his crate, and when he would normally be whining and trying to get out, he just sat there silent. Like he was relaxed. After 3 hours, he did start whining, so I guess it wore off. but I was happy for the time he was calm. I will use it again and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: jason anderson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect rememdy for storms, 4th of July and anxiety
customer_reviews.text: My dogs hate the flavor of this so I simply drip it on a piece of cheese or I squeeze a dropper of this on some kibble and let it soak in. My 2 dogs gobble it up. About 15 minutes after eating, they are asleep. They awake healthy with no residual effects. I learned to be careful to wash my hands after preparing this or use gloves because it makes me sleepy. I am very sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: LoriPurdy Faitel

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for my cat
customer_reviews.text: I used this with my very skittish cat for her trip to the vet. I didn't notice any difference. It didn't seem to calm or relax her at all. I also tried it on several other occasions and didn't see any noticeable change. Maybe it just doesn't work with some pets. Otherwise, it was packaged nicely, and the bottle was sealed. The lid is a dropper and makes it easy to put on food, water, etc. I just wish it had worked.
customer_reviews.author: Jess B.

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I’ve tried positive reinforcement, treats, distractions, thundershirts, “happy traveler,” lavender spray, calming chews, and NONE worked. My corgi is afraid of the trash truck and semi brakes. She pants and shakes uncontrollably, it is so devastating seeing her. I’ve finally found something that actually helps her! 4 drops of this worked wonders!
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS PRODUCT... MY DOG COUGHS PERIODICALLY AND THIS HELPS CALM THE COUGH!
customer_reviews.author: Cindi B

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver!
customer_reviews.text: One of my rescue friends recommended this product because we were moving and I was afraid our cats would freak out since they don't like new environments. Sure enough, one of the cats would NOT sleep through the night. He'd stay up crying (meowing) all night long. After I gave him this, he'd sleep peacefully through the night. I also used it on one of the dogs over the 4th of July holiday because he hates fireworks. It works wonders!
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: I am very skeptical when it comes to holistic cures. Wow, was I impressed the first time I used this. It was "prescribed" by my vet and as usual it was a good investment. My Happy dog quiets right down with this. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Northwest Girl

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! My dog is 18, has occasional arthritic flare-ups and toothaches, and I much prefer using this product instead of his prescription pain meds, which are not supposed to be used for more than 3 days in a row. It provides real relief!
customer_reviews.author: Back2Future

customer_reviews.title: Definitely helps..
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended by a friend for my 5 year old lab mix who is terrified of thunder and fireworks. It has definitely helped calm her for thunder and the few days leading up to the 4th of July with small fireworks going off. However, it didn’t even phase her the night of 4th of July. I still think it’s a great product and will continue to use it during thunderstorms.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Donahoo

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: We used this on 2 of our Yorkies (3 lbs & 5 lbs) during neighborhood fireworks. In years past they would shiver uncontrollably. This year was so much better. The 3-lb Yorkie slept through 2.5 hours of fireworks. The 5-lb Yorkie didn’t shiver but remained on “high alert” during the fireworks. Next time I’ll give her a little more. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Niedt

customer_reviews.title: My dog had no reaction good or bad.
customer_reviews.text: Did not help my poor pooch at all, still extreme anxiety over the 4th of July weekend....well actually they are still a popular form of entertainment here just about every weekend. Doesn't mean it won't work for your dog, but I did discover that a snug little t-shirt seems to calm him down greatly. Glad I did not spend a fortune on one of those brand name shirts to do the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Trump

customer_reviews.title: Works amazingly well!
customer_reviews.text: Our Labrador is terrified of thunder. He shakes like a leaf and tries to hide under the furniture. Within half an hour of getting his drops, he is much more calm, almost to the point of being mellow. If we can get him his drops before he hears the thunder (we keep a close eye on the radar), he doesn’t have the anxiety attacks. It has been a life saver for him!
customer_reviews.author: Diz

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for my cats.
customer_reviews.text: Adopted two special needs cats who had been highly abused and traumatized. Put this in their food for several months hoping it would help them relax. Really didn’t see a difference. I think it was just time, and then realizing that they are safe, that did the trick. Will not buy again, just too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Laura G.

customer_reviews.title: Works on my 70 lb Lab 1 dose a day per Frightening event, calms the quivering and running threw the house
customer_reviews.text: Great product if your dog reacts by trembling to storms and running crazy about the house you may want to try this, works superior for my 70 lb. ILab I started with a minimal dose but found he need a little more. It’s all natural ingredients, I like that but I try to stay at one dropper full a day due to event and use the droper to the side of mouth to administer and abit of water as well cause his mouth gets dry during a panic attack. He usually 95% of time chills out little by little within 30 min
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't calm my cats down
customer_reviews.text: The product was shipped fine. However the oil didn't seem to have any effect on my cat's. They've been stressed out with a new living situation so I was hoping it would help with that but they didn't seem any less timid. I then had gotten a tip of putting it in their water; well that just made the cats sick. I also tried it with my sister's cat before giving her a bath and that didn't seem to calm her down either, but it could have been because of the bath itself haha
customer_reviews.author: Christina Gamer

product_meta.title: Rescue Remedy Natural Homeopathic Stress Relief Drops For Pets, 20 ml
feature_bullets: Look for "SHIPS AND SOLD BY AMAZON.COM” to ensure RESCUE USA product authenticity and valid expiration/use by dates.
Visiting the vet or groomer, loud noises, separation, and traveling are just some of the reasons your pet can feel stressed - RESCUE REMEDY PET can help to keep them calm
RESCUE REMEDY PET contains the original RESCUE REMEDY tincture, Dr Bach's famous combination of 5 flower essences hand-picked from his original gardens in the United Kingdom
Administer 4 drops orally to your pet as often as needed. The dosage of RESCUE REMEDY PET does not depend on the weight or type of animal - it depends on the situation of stress
RESCUE REMEDY PET with natural active homeopathic ingredients is alcohol-free and suitable for dogs, cats, horses, rabbits, birds and lizards
This pet friendly remedy is safe, non-drowsy and trusted by veterinarians and pet owners alike to reduce occasional animal stress and tension without sedatives

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
